title: Working with a computer: step by step
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Pat Dowling and John Dutot
brief_description: The first part of an introductory course on practical use of electronic data processing, discussing the main elements of the operation and parts of a computer. Its high speed and flexibility make it a tool of immense power.
